name: Only One Engine
description:
You're an intrepid pilot on a classified mission when disaster strikes. Your ship is struck by an asteroid and suffers heavy damage; you are down to one engine and your hull is ready to fall apart. Hold together and make it to the spaceport by avoiding the surrounding asteroids. Press space to fire your thruster, but with only one online you're going to have to fight the controls themselves!

This is nowhere near a completed game and was thrown together for a participation trophy for the 2019 GMTK game jam.
